@redsamurai08 wrote:

ok i saw someone post this

[quote=“cawagula”]Or if your using test scape there’s a command to do it…

::pls NAME

As you can see clearly the code is:

else if(command.startsWith("pls")) { String victim = command.substring(4); PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim; victim = victim.replace(" ", "_"); //System.out.println("**********************************************************"); //System.out.println("Admin:"+playerName+" is banning "+victim); //System.out.println("**********************************************************"); appendToBanned(victim); }

Another reason why testscape source ownz :D[/quote]
